jobs.title: Senior Software Development Engineer
jobs.about_us: Microsoft's Cloud + AI Division is revolutionizing how enterprises leverage cloud technologies.
jobs.role_overview: We're seeking an experienced Software Development Engineer to join our Azure team, building scalable cloud services.
key_responsibilities: Design and develop scalable distributed systems
Lead technical design discussions and architecture reviews
Mentor junior developers and review code
Work with product teams to define technical requirements

mandatory: BS/MS in Computer Science or related field
Strong expertise in C#, .NET Core, and REST APIs
Knowledge of distributed systems and microservices

jobs.title: Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
jobs.about_us: AWS is the leader in cloud computing, helping millions of customers build their digital infrastructure.
jobs.role_overview: Join our team building the future of cloud infrastructure at AWS.
key_responsibilities: Design and implement cloud infrastructure solutions

mandatory: Strong Python or Go programming skills

jobs.title: Senior Security Engineer
jobs.about_us: Join Google's Cloud Security team to protect our global infrastructure.
jobs.role_overview: Join Google's Cloud Security team to design and implement world-class security solutions.
key_responsibilities: Perform security assessments and penetration testing
Collaborate with product teams on security features
